definition[0]: if someone waylays you, they stop you when you are going somewhere, for example to attack you or talk to you
example[0]: They used to waylay him as he came out of the factory.
definition[1]: if you are waylaid, you are delayed when you are doing something â€“ often used humorously to say why you are late
example[1]: Sorry, we got waylaid at the bar.
explanation[0]: Waylay is usually passive in this meaning
